level.text: 549.1 Each District-certified emergency medical response vehicle thatransports patients shall meet the following minimum staffing requirement:
A Basic Life Support Ambulance shall have two (2) District-certifiedmergency Medical Technicians;
An Advanced Life Support Ambulance shall have one (1) District-certifiedaramedic and one (1) District-certified Emergency Medical Technician; and
Each air medical response craft shall have one (1) District- certifiedmergency Medical Technician – Intermediate or Paramedic and one (1) licensedilot.
